headline: Miller Launches New Women’s PPE Line Built for a Better Fit
summary: APPLETON, Wis., September 03, 2025--Miller Electric Mfg. LLC, a leading worldwide manufacturer of Miller® brand arc welding equipment, announces the release of a new line of personal protective equipment (PPE) designed specifically for women in welding and related trades. The launch marks a step forward in creating jobsite gear that prioritizes function and fit, helping all workers perform at their best without the discomfort posed by oversized or ill-fitting PPE.

thumbnail.caption: New Women's PPE line up: Tailored jackets and fitted gloves
